website_summaries.verdict: For families and lovers of casual games, the still-affordable Wii represents the best console bundle value of the holiday season in terms of dollars spent; however, the Wii's getting long in the tooth, and other game consoles offer more entertainment options and functionality for their higher price tags.
pros: still-iconic controller design can be used for motion games or more traditional button-based games
Virtual Console library and WiiWare games offer a unique and affordable collection of classic titles
Wii Sports Resort and Wii Sports included with system
Wii Remote Plus controller updated to include MotionPlus built-in
cons: Online connectivity hampered by closed-garden design
graphics and video playback cap at 480p
other than Netflix, no other video-streaming or entertainment offerings
graphics continue to look ever more outdated compared with rival consoles
the unique qualities that motion gaming offered are now available in accessories from rival consoles

customer_reviews.title: Cute Wii Controller
customer_reviews.text: Like new Wii controller but might as well be brand new. It's in great shape and works well with the system. No problems syncing to the system and I love with the color I can tell my controller apart from my boys' so my controller doesn't get the kid treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: ... working remote but now i have one that works great, im still trying to learn how to use ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a few times to get a working remote but now i have one that works great, im still trying to learn how to use the wii. The seller was very good at trying to het me what i wanted and tested them to make sure they worked before he sent it out. Very nice young man to deal with
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine... So Far!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from Amazon-fulfilled seller Chromeboy. I've received counterfeit PS3 controllers and have heard of fake Wiimotes so I'm hoping this isn't one. The face is glossy pink with a matte pink backing. Came pre-inserted into a clear silicone grip in what appears to be retail Wii U packaging. It synced with my original Wii just fine. Only time will tell if it's a fake or not. Let's hope NOT!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a second remote to go along with our new Wii bundle in black. My daughter was disappointed that we didn't have a second remote to play 2 person games, and was delighted when she received this. If you are purchasing a Wii, I would highly recommend getting this remote, the Remote Plus, not the ones that have an 'add on' to them, as this fits perfectly with chargers and the newer accessories.
customer_reviews.author: sandrawg

customer_reviews.title: Bad hardware. Stops working after a while
customer_reviews.text: I dont have any complains with the electronics used. But after using it for a while I found that the silicone used below the buttons degraded and the button push functionality didnt work as expected. The Button '1' & '2' didnt pop back immediately when pressed. On opening the remote, i found that the silicone had a cut. My original OEM remote is still functional same way as a new remote but not this remote. The price of this remote is almost the same price as OEM but not as per functionality.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: I'm adequately satisfied for the priced
customer_reviews.text: These are knockoffs. If I paid full price ($40) then I would be upset. And I can't find anywhere that it says they are genuine Nintendo. The sensor is a tad shaky and the plastic has some rough edges. But I would rather pay for this then 40 for a genuine one that does the same and looks the same. I'm hoping with more gameplay it won't let me down. I just want everyone to be aware that these ARE NOT GENUINE NINTENDO PRODUCTS but they look exactly the same and so far function about the same. I did read some other reviews where people had more of a rough time. But so far, I'm adequately satisfied for the priced.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie Parnacott

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The Wii remote I ordered works perfect, no issues, idk if it is really brand new but it appears that way and I have no issues with the motion sensors.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Matches Blue Wii console perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a Christmas gift to go along with the blue Wii from our kids aunt and uncle. It is identical to the Wii remote that came with the Wii console. I am planning on purchasing two more to have all four remotes match the console. Update - 1/19/2011 We purchased two more and they work fine no problem. One difference though is that the newest two I ordered have a sync button on the outside of the battery cover. It allows you to sync the remote without removing the battery cover. Also there is a small hole in the jelly cover to allow you to press the button without removing the jelly cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: JRG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Period.
customer_reviews.text: The Pink Wii Remote Plus is awesome. It looks, feels and works great. It is lightweight and it came with 2 AA batteries, wrist strap and a clear sleeve. It arrived well ahead of schedule and in perfect condition. The Wii Remote Plus is flawless and is clearly better than the bulky Wii remote with Motion Plus attachment. I have the black Wii Remote Plus and have had the same success. Currently looking into buying a blue one. Well worth the price to go with Nintendo and not with Nyko or Wu. Have used both generic brands and have had a lot of problems with syncing, and overall accuracy. Go with Nintendo!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Get the real thing...
customer_reviews.text: After doing lots of research on all these inexpensive bundles or imitation Chinese Wii Motion Plus, I decided to just go for this one and not risk the gamble of getting a bad controller. There's a website or two out there that will give you side by side photos of just how close the knock-offs look, with their subtle differences. This controller has been working flawlessly since I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: Nitwit

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It came in perfect condition as described. I’m very satisfied with my purchase. It’s an original Wii remote
customer_reviews.author: CeCDBen

customer_reviews.title: Pink for the Wife
customer_reviews.text: I had recently bought a Wii system and was excited about playing with it. The problem is, there wasn't another controller that came with it. I went online and look through various places until I came across this. The 2nd remote was going to be mainly for my wife. She likes the color pink and became very excited when she saw one in the store a few days before. This ended up being the perfect purchase. Not to mention that it works flawlessly. I sometimes find mine lagging while hers doesn't miss a beat.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie F

customer_reviews.title: They worked well
customer_reviews.text: These work fine but I've never been crazy about the Wii remote.
customer_reviews.author: Natt

customer_reviews.title: Kids give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Cool blue/pink controller! Holla holla savin' dolla, on Amazon! Most important thing is the kids say it works just like the "better black one" (of the two that came with the Wii)and just as responsive. If they like it, then we're good! We only had two and needed more because we all wanted to play. Best thing for me is that it came with the OEM, good-feel, cushiony, real-deal cover (not an off-brand thin silicone skin you can get for $1.00). The cover is clear so blue/pink shows through. It is nice to have controller color variety!
customer_reviews.author: A2

customer_reviews.title: Great controller
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Sensitivity is much improved from the original Wii-mote. Only gripe is that it doesn't come with rechargeable batteries (it does include non-rechargeable AAs). I found the black model much better looking than the white, especially in the black protective jacket.
customer_reviews.author: N. Strack

customer_reviews.title: Black.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows a Nintendo made product is going to be the best for a Nintendo system. No point in reiterating 100 other reviews. I've noticed the price fluctuates on these things (check back daily). Note that the other black accessories you'll want to accompany this may cost you more as well (such as the nunchuck, but those prices fluctuate as well). And good luck finding a zapper or steering wheel or other accessories that match. Just pointing out the total cost to go black may be more than you realize.
customer_reviews.author: MussSyke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very reliable
customer_reviews.text: Nintendo really got it right when they designed the Wii Remote. It fits so easily in the hand, all the controls are within easy reach of your thumbs, and it's just the right weight and shape. Imitators often have problems connecting, or staying connected, or they just end up falling apart the more you use them. This remote has gone through a lot of use and is just like the day it was new. Don't forget to put on the strap and sleeve - they're included for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Norton

customer_reviews.title: Great!,
customer_reviews.text: It is the Wii Remote with the Wii Motion Plus inside!! The WRP has the Wii Motion Plus accessory already built inside of it and it is the same size and weight as the standard Nintendo Wii Remote when the standard Nintendo Wii Remote does not have the Wii Motion Plus equipped onto it. You have to remember that equipping and unequipping the Wii Motion Plus accessories just to play a game makes it where you don't want to play the game anymore.
customer_reviews.author: khaled

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Remote came with batteries completely corrosive inside remote. Can’t believe that it was not opened up and tested at all before being sold.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaH

customer_reviews.title: Wii Remote Plus
customer_reviews.text: This remote is much easier to use. No more bother of looking for and putting on the Wii Plus adapter. The original remote with the adapter plugged in made the remote too long and clumsy for my small hands. The new remote with the "plus adapter" built in is so much more comfortable and easier to use. You cannot beat the service, reliability and speed in which Amazon provides. I don't have any connections with Amazon except being a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Lainee C.

customer_reviews.title: Pink for mom in a house of men
customer_reviews.text: I got this for me ( mom) because I am surrounded by men. I wanted my own identity and here is my answer. Tho I am constantly fighting my youngest for it. He seems to love pink. If I find a green one, he would leave me alone with my pink. Apparently he is very ok with his feminine side showing from time to time. (he is only 5). This wii mote has worked great, haven't had any problems with it. It works great with the games we have.
customer_reviews.author: K. Oaks

customer_reviews.title: I received a fake remote, it worked for everything ...
customer_reviews.text: I received a fake remote, it worked for everything I needed, but the Motion Plus was much more jumpy than it should have been. Noticeable due to lack of "Wii Motion Plus" at bottom of controller and no "-" or "+" text on respective buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Swisz

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This remote was advertised with motion plus inside and the one I received was the old remote with no motion plus. Very disappointed. Now I cannot use it with my wii resort sports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect!!!! Only remote to have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! I love my remote I tried rock candy at first 2 times and it just didn't respond like I wanted it to, for example playing super Mario I had to shake my rock candy remote like super hard to get it to respond when picking up my toad to rescue which needs to be fast. This remote is waaaaay more sensitive and I am really happy I die allot less now haha
customer_reviews.author: Monkeysmommy

customer_reviews.title: Had this remote for years and it has never given ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this remote for years and it has never given me any problems. Even with kids dropping it, throwing it, and using it with sticky and wet hands when they play while eating snacks
customer_reviews.author: Seahawkfan39

customer_reviews.title: Better than what came with it
customer_reviews.text: These new controllers are a big step up from the original controllers, they are night and day from the aftermarket. we just got through with the whole Wii sports games and can honestly say they work better from farther away and they do control the bowling game better, my son still won but I could put a good spin on the ball. They also worked better with tennis on reaction time. So yes they are more expensive, but they are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Papa and Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Beware of fraud.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine on here and got a cheap, Chinese knockoff instead, meant to look like the real thing, which broke moments after trying it. The functionality was minimal at best. DO NOT BUY THIS ONLINE! Go to a trusted store like Gamestop or Walmart and get the real thing. If you happen to want one used, know the differences before buying. They aren't very clear at first, but on close examination you should be able to tell. Good luck. It's risky.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy McElwrath

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and better
customer_reviews.text: This is a standard Wii remote, but with a twist. It has the Wii Motion Plus inside (eliminating the bulky add-on), which makes it smaller and easier to use (as well as more responsive). It also comes with a silicone rubber cover and batteries, a big plus. Basically, this remote has it all. If you need a new or replacement Wii controller, this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Splatt

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than expected
customer_reviews.text: I knew this would be cheap, but its worse than expected. I use my wii about once a month. I turn the remotes off every time, yet this remote somehow drains the batteries.. EVERY MONTH! I can't keep the batteries in the remote unless i'm playing.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter squealed when she saw the pink remote and was very excited to get this for Christmas. It enhanced her playing time and has held up under her and her friends use. Loves the pink. Her twin brother or his friends wouldn't be caught dead using a pink remote. Big plus for her. There is no arguing on who's remote battery is not charged, or which one can't find theirs. Took the mystery out of who's remote is who's.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fun controller for any female
customer_reviews.text: This Wii Remote is so much fun for any female who loves the color pink! I love my pink Wii Remote because it adds a pop of fun to the bland colors they usually include with gaming systems, like black or white. After I purchased this, it is so easy for my brother and me to distinguish whose remote is whose. I would definitely recommend this Wii Remote to anyone who likes pink!
customer_reviews.author: hoosier_girl

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was considering buying "alternative" extra remotes for the Wii but after checking some out I decided to go for the quality Nintendo is known for and I have to say I'm not dissapointed at all... Great pieces of gear!!! I have been using and abusing them for a while and had no issues at all. I definetively recommend buying rechargeable battery packs for this since they are always going to need powering-up and my personal choice was to buy the Energizer Induction flat pannel charger w/battery packs... For me that's the perfect match!!!
customer_reviews.author: Franz Alarcon

customer_reviews.title: Controller Breakdown
customer_reviews.text: Getting fed up with these controllers. Out of 4 purchased, including the one bundled with the wii, 2 have gone bad. Got partial credit for the black one in the bundle. Now the replacement has gone bad just past the 30-day return window. Apparently it was not working correctly out of the box. But they were gifts - so the recipient was trying to avoid telling me about the 2nd one until it failed completely. So we missed out on the return. These things are a real nuisance. If the family didn't love playing the games so much I'd skip it.
customer_reviews.author: isitjustme

customer_reviews.title: This is my second review to confirm that this product ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review to confirm that this product is not performing as should. I have another nintendo wii report and I have never had problems with its calibration.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Whatever...
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a remote motion plus and was not. The seller was helpful and said they would let me return it, but when I discovered that I had to pay for the shipping I decided to keep it. It is in good condition and came fast, so apart from not being able to use it on half my games it's good. My son uses it for Mario kart and it works.
customer_reviews.author: tas

customer_reviews.title: Player 2 has joined the fight
customer_reviews.text: Works with the Wii and the Wii U. Comes with the Wii remote jacket already on. Nunchuk is sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Please Play Plok

customer_reviews.title: as expected from a 4.5 star amazon purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seller: Amazon - as always, awesome service. i have amazon prime account so this came through free 2-day shipping (weekends don't count). placed my order and got it two days later! it is always funny to find my small wii remoted shipped in a shoebox-sized shipping box with paper fillings. Product: i bought this wii plus remote for $34.60 (with free 2-day shipping by Prime). compared to $49.99 at my local bestbuy store, this is a good deal. i've had it for a week and have played it every day. it works well (might actually be slightly better than the wii plus remote that came with the console). it came with 2 panasonic-branded batteries. NO nunchuck... :(
customer_reviews.author: forbetterinformedbuyers

customer_reviews.title: Wii Remote
customer_reviews.text: This is a great remote. With it being a different color, (blue) we now have 3,white, blue, & red, all with Motion Plus so no more fighting over which remote belongs to who. When we have the grand kids lay them down for dinner they know which is theirs. It comes complete with strap and cover. The only thing I wish it had that it doesn't is a rechargeable battery. But I knew that when I bought it. Will be our next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: Works well and packaged well. Our daughter loves it and the customer service was good as well. Now she can play with her friends when they're here for sleepovers.
customer_reviews.author: Ayndie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this remote as my add on wii motion plus had stopped working. I needed the motion plus to play the latest zelda game. The remote has the motion plus built in, and is much easy to use than the add on, especially since it uses the smaller jacket size. Functions well with the game and I use it as the primary remote now. Good price compared to the cost of the add on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time Wii owner and love this remote. It was a little costly, but not in comparison to what I found in the store. Just about every game requires the wii remote plus capabilities. You won't be sorry with this report! It allows you to be active and athletic with games. That a win-win to me. I can be active or stationary on the couch, either way the remote plus captures movement like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: See comments
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered a used Wii Remoter Plus from Seller ExpressMedia. As soon as I opened the packed I knew it was wrong. There was no badging on the bottom saying, "WiiMotion Plus INSIDE" Brought it up with Amazon, they refunded my money, told me I could keep it, and refunded my shipping and tax on a brand new Wii Remote Plus.
customer_reviews.author: Brad A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Real Nintendo controller. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a motion plus controller made by Nintendo. This one is.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Hausam

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to get a new Wii remot for my Wii as I wanted to play with 4 people. This allowed me to do that, and was a great color choice! The white/black get boring. I love that it includes the motion plus so you don't need the extra chunk when you want to play a game! Would definitely buy this again if I needed another remote!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: In original box and in brand new condition. I have used it many times and it appears to work in 100% perfect condition. I can't find fault with it what-so-ever. It is everything I expected. Seller did an excellent job and delivered in every way promised and expediently. I am happy with transaction!
customer_reviews.author: cali_yz_rider

customer_reviews.title: Like the internal motion plus feature and color
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for the kids to upgrade to the motion plus remotes. This is the compact design where the motion plus is not hanging out the end and they like that. Only dissapointed there is no nunchuck in blue, they really like the color and easy to tell apart from their older model remotes. Also, it fits in the steering wheel for the driving games.
customer_reviews.author: MidMom

customer_reviews.title: What's there to say?
customer_reviews.text: The rating system is strange for this product, but there's not a whole lot to say. It's by Nintendo, it works great. I don't think there's any peripheral out currently that the blue color would look good attached to, but I didn't buy it to look good in a plastic guitar or plastic blaster. Works great with Energizer rechargeable 2300 Nickel-Metal Hydride batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Taiga

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get another one of these to play with the WiiU for Nintendoland, and wow did my daughter go crazy over this pink controller. She thinks it's her very own, and it's hard to explain any different, so we just let it be. It's a solidly built controller of standard Wii design and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando_B

customer_reviews.title: Great Wii remotes
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra remotes for my games so I ordered 2 more updated versions of the ones I already have. They came as expected and are great. I meant to order rechargeable remotes, but they were the regular kind so I was going to return them. My daughter wanted them so I'm giving them to her. She loves them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: No Problems!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it since we only had one remote. Programming it was easy. We now have one black remote and one pink one. Both have wii motion plus built inside. I have used both remotes and both work with ease! It comes with a strap, a clear rubber skin, and 2 AA (LR-6) batteries.
customer_reviews.author: IcantThinkOFApinName

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wii remote works great, no issues since purchase and its been dropped several times during gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge D.

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: It functions really well but it seems to suck down the batteries a lot faster than the black remote that came with our wii. It also doesn't always put the Wii into standby like it should. Not a big deal though. Gotta get up anyways when you're done playing the game.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eberle

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: works good so far, good price....... just thought it came with a rubber case...i was one that did not get one.
customer_reviews.author: andrea morrow

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: The remote is pretty dirty. There are hair and stick stuff on it. Disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to My Wii
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Wii from a friend. It had the original remote without the motion sensor. The Remote Plus works much better with my fitness games. I use the old remote and new remote with Exerbeat. The Remote Plus is better. I've ordered the motion sensor adapter to see if it helps with the original remote.
customer_reviews.author: J Will

customer_reviews.title: Use your accessories without pain
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of Wii Remote accessories, including Wii Wheel for Mario Kart, and Dumbbell for Wii Fit (My wife actually uses it!). So having to connect and disconnect the Plus accessory was painful, and most of the time you decide to play your game without the accessory. So the Wii Remote Plus brings all your accessories back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Good remote
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this wii mote a couple times, and I have no problem with it. I bought the entire system which came wiht a wii mote and numchuk, and two games. I got the black system and we have had great fun as a family playing the games. The wii mote is very sensitive and responds quickly with the motion plus. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Candylady987

customer_reviews.title: Great for Wii
customer_reviews.text: They have finally gotten around to doing the obvious and that is to include what was motion plus attachment you had to plud into the old controllers as already built in to this newer unit. Great idea and long overdue in my opinion. No complaints at all, works exactly as expected on our Wii. Very happy. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: D. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Much more competent than Wii Motion Plus.
customer_reviews.text: Downside to Wii Remote Plus is theres only 2 games that matter in the Wii's library that Motion Plus can be used for. This particular remote along with the nunchuck feel much cheaper and lighter in build quality than my white remote. But it works and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Njrg

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the remote, but was not happy when I received the pink instead of the blue
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: CONTERFEIT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this controller for 3 months, and started having issues with it. I inspected it vs. the controller I received with my Wii system. They are not the same. They look very very very similar but if you really look at them, there are differences. I believe the one I have is a conterfeit...too be safe I suggest purchasing it from a retailer not from Hercules!
customer_reviews.author: t-dizzle

customer_reviews.title: Only got it for Zelda
customer_reviews.text: I am guessing Nintendo that Nintendo wanted to profitize from its best selling franchise by synching a different remote with that game (LOZ Skyward Sword) and every game after that. I have to say the remote works great and looks like any other wii remote besides the half crescent inscription at the bottom of the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hegarty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as they are supposed to, and takes some minor abuse as well . . lol's.
customer_reviews.author: Meandering

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a Wii mote, what can I say. Baby Blue was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Stahl

customer_reviews.title: It comes with sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Wii remote to supplement the remote that came with the Wii console... Neither the description nor the picture mentioned anything about the sleeve. When I opened the box, surprised to see the sleeve... and the price is much cheaper on Amzon.com than any of the local/national chains...
customer_reviews.author: Krish

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it works great. No issues. Shipped timely. This controller has the WII motion plus built in. this is a great asset. We still have to add the WII motion plus to all the older controllers, but not this one, as it is built in.
customer_reviews.author: Christy H. Moose

customer_reviews.title: These remotes rock
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness they incorporated the motion-plus in the normal size remote and got rid of the silly usb attachment. These are really awesome remotes--work great, are durable--they've been slapped around and in to hard things more than a few times, and still work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jobew

customer_reviews.title: Wii Remote Plus - Black
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought by Wii it only game with one remote, and since we play with more than one person, we decided to get another remote. The remote is exactly the same as the one come with the game, just in black! Will be getting a pink one too!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Wii
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for Christmas. They look and work just like the ones that came with the Wii. Love the fact that the motion sensor is built in - one less piece to buy. Just a note - we also purchased the remote charger that holds up to 4 remotes. A must have for your Wii system.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked ok just eats through batteries like crazy. wont be buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Borngesser

customer_reviews.title: cant read chinese
customer_reviews.text: but that's OK, i don't have to. It looks like these are genuine Nintendo, but the retail packaging and instructions are all in Chinese. Units literally took the slow boat from China, but the price was right and they worked perfectly, just took a while to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Worthless piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller 5 days ago and when it arrived in my mailbox this afternoon, I was hoping it would be better than the Wii remote that came with the Wii that I had for 7 years. But when I tried it out, I was really disappointed. The up and down portions of the D-Pad would not work whenever I was on the Wii U menu, and there was no cursor! I looked at some web videos and unplugged and replugged the sensor bar and guess what? Nothing worked! Whoever sold this defect to me listen to this: I want my money back! For everyone else, do not buy used controllers, only new ones!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Pope

customer_reviews.title: God value for money
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying a Nintendo Wii, you already know what it is and decided to buy it. It is less expensive compared to other boxes and I love the games. It is good enough for me. Graphics is not great but t is still good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Pink Paddle Lover!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is such a nice pink paddle! The shade of pink is just the perfect shade! I wouldn't have wanted it more pastel or more neon. It's just right in the middle perfect. Plus, obviously the controller made by Nintendo is way better than one made by any other company. Also, having the MotionPlus built in is just nice like a glove on a hand. I wish you could buy more pink products. They're so beautiful! I beat New Super Mario Bros for Wii using it. I don't think I could have beat it with any other controller. Buy this one if you want to enhance your game play with pink power!
customer_reviews.author: jondo_means

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all Ages!
customer_reviews.text: Played the Wiii the first time during Christmas, decided we had to have one and get up off sofa. We truly are enjoying learning, playing and the exercise we are getting, (Seniors)but trying to stay active, Playig the Wii has really been fun. I bought the pink remote for me, the black one came with the system. We also bought the Wii Sports DVD game, LOVE, LOVE, LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: P. McLendon

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Major improvement over the original Wii remote. Much more accurate and turns off automatically if not used. We only use our Wii for Web TV, and the old remote had to be tucked into a couch cushion to keep it from connecting to the TV & killing the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ess

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: It does what it should. I like the glossy black finish too, too bad it's a finger print magnet but oh well. The Plus upgrade is also great, a real improvement over the original WiiMote.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo controller
customer_reviews.text: A great controller. A little more expensive than the others but it is the official controller. It connects quickly and works just as good as the controller that came with the game system. I only wish I could have found it in red to match the system. But be careful because there are red ones out there but they have some technical issues with them. Apparently they do not connect well and make high pitched noises when in use. My advice, spend a little more and get quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So I could not tell you the difference between this remote and the remote that came with Wii originally. Both are still working perfectly over a year later. To me, that's all anyone could ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a plastic case and a hand strap. This works really well. I was skeptical at first since I never really tried using a Wii-mote, but as I played with it more, I gradually started to like the Wii mote. It is really a very innovative design. To top it off, the color looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Lantaca

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Nintendo product, great color, comes with rubber sleeve and batteries
customer_reviews.text: We love this remote, the color is great, it stands out and is easy to find. It is a genuine Nintendo product, comes with the rubber sleeve, batteries, and the wrist strap. It paired instantly. Great remote, very fast shipping, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: OEM remote, received in original package, mint condition
customer_reviews.text: The product appeared to be brand new. If it was repackaged, I couldn't tell, but I believe it's original packaging. There are third party manufacturers of these remotes. I can't say if they work the same or not, my personal preference was for a Nintendo built remote. This is the same as the one that came with my Wii. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I stuck with the name brand controllers, and I am not disappointed. The new motion plus works just the same as our old controller with the attachment, so we are happy. It is a little different having a shorter controller, but it's a matter of getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Deighton

customer_reviews.title: Love the built in Motion Plus
customer_reviews.text: I really am happy that Nintendo came out with a Wii remote with built in Motion Plus. It is the same size as the original Wii remote without the attachment. I have traded in all my old remotes and bought all new Wii Remote Plus remotes just different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Should have been this way from the start
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my regular Wii Remote with the motion plus attachment was having some issues. Nintendo should have gone with this from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Nyan Cat

customer_reviews.title: Wii. Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: Factory remote works like new is new love the white
customer_reviews.author: joshua mcgath

customer_reviews.title: It is an ok controller
customer_reviews.text: Controller seems to loose the sensor connection while playing a game several times. This controller is for wii u and will work for wii. I am using it for the wii this maybe the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: not stated clearly
customer_reviews.text: when this had arrived it was in a clear plastic bag, i was under the impression that it was a brand new controller in the original box, it was new but not clearly stated
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Provost

customer_reviews.title: Good seller exactly as described works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Remote works perfect, arrived exactly how seller described, and very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany K

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Got a blue and a pink controller from northkentcash..movies via Amazon These were OEM w/o retail packaging. They both came with everything in the box except for the batteries. They looked and smelled new and both work. Can't ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: TXLeeVee

customer_reviews.title: WORKS PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: Great remote and the kids love the colors. Ready for use immediately after opening the box and I mean it comes with batteries! Whether you order the Blue Remote, the Pink Remote, or the White Remote, you will not be disappointed. The silicone cover and wrist strap keeps the remote comfortable and secure in your hand while playing all your games. I am a frugile shopper but don't regret spending a little more for the authentic Nientendo products.
customer_reviews.author: Adela A. Rose

customer_reviews.title: nice OM Wii remote controllers!
customer_reviews.text: nice OM Wii remote controllers! my daughter wont use the candy blue that came with the special edition Wii system we got her, so I guess when my 2yrs old gets bigger he will have 2 new blue controller for himself! ;)
customer_reviews.author: AlexCTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Good remote
customer_reviews.text: This remote is pretty much what I expected. It has a nice pink color that the ladies sometimes prefer and included motion plus. I have had no problems with this remote: it works flawlessly and is well built.
customer_reviews.author: The Captain

customer_reviews.title: I was able to easily sync it to my Wii without any trouble
customer_reviews.text: This controller arrived as advertised and has worked flawlessly. I was able to easily sync it to my Wii without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Jaded121

customer_reviews.title: Wiimote works on PC bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This is the only Wii Remote with the Motion Plus built in that works fully with my PC Bluetooth adapter. I use it for the Dolphin Emulator and on various PC games via Glovepie.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the Motion Plus accessory
customer_reviews.text: I have young kids who like to play several different games in their short allotted Wii time. So we were constantly changing from WiiWheel to Motion Plus to plain remote (the Motion Plus accressory adds weight to the unit which makes point and shoot games harder for them to control). All of this changing was frustrating for them and for their parents. This Remote Plus reduces the transition time considerably without any sacrifice of play quality. I highly recommend this product to anyone buying additional or replacement remotes for their Wii.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: It's a slightly better Wiimote
customer_reviews.text: Just like the headline says, it's a slight upgrade from the original. I don't believe the addition of the wii motion plus actually improves the accuracy that much, but the actual remote feels better in your hand thanks to the added weight. Overall, if you have a Wiimote and don't need a + to play certain games (like Skyward Sword) just stick to what you have.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: wii remote plus
customer_reviews.text: I and the kids enjoy the simplicity of having the newer version of the wii remote having the earlier version to compare it too, it is less bulky and easier for the smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J.

customer_reviews.title: Great remote with built in motion plus
customer_reviews.text: So this is much better than having the giant remote with the adapter. Works great and is very easy to set up. The thing that could make this remote better is if the included case was the color of the remote as well as the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: great add on
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Great add on to my console. Works like its suppose to. Be aware that the instructions come in Asian language which I did not understand. Just did common procedure as the normal remote and voila it linked with the Wii.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rojas

product_meta.title: Wii Remote Controller - Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue| Edition:Newest modelSimple. Intuitive. Easy to use. The Wii Remote Plus is a unique controller for the Wii video game system. Now with the increased sensitivity of Wii MotionPlus built-in. The button pressing of typical controllers is replaced by the natural, fluid motion of your hand. The Wii Remote Plus senses your every action and makes you feel less like a player and more like you’re part of the game. With Wii, anyone can play. Some games may require additional accessories (sold separately). See game instruction manuals. Wii MotionPlus accessory not required.

AMAZON.COM



INTRODUCING THE NEW STANDARD WII CONTROLLER
 The Wii Remote Plus Controller is the new standard controller for the Wii gaming system, shipping with new Wii systems as well as available for individual purchase. Like the original Wii Remote before it, this new controller utilizes a triple axis accelerometer along with a built-in optical sensor that works in conjunction with the Wii sensor bar. Together this enables the recognition of player movement as well as gives the controller the ability to act as a pointing device used in-game. Yet what really sets the Wii Remote Plus controller apart is its incorporation of additional gyroscope technology. 

 Wii Remote Plus gyroscope technology provides on-the-fly rotational motion recognition, once available only to Wii players who purchased the additional Wii MotionPlus accessory for the Wii Remote. The Wii Remote Plus controller contains all these motion-capturing capabilities within the body of a single controller. To top it off the Wii Remote Plus controller maintains the same compatibility to games as the Wii Remote, so you can play most of your old favorites with it. It is also the same size as the Wii remote. Taken together this means no more extra accessories to buy in order to experience the full effect of past or future games designed to take advantage of advanced Wii MotionPlus technology; no more compatibility issues with existing Wii Remote peripherals and skins. Just sync up your Wii Remote Plus controller and have at it. 

KEY FEATURES
 * Moving forward the Wii Remote Plus is the standard Wii controller, shipping with all consoles
 * Incorporates the functionality of the original Wii Remote and that of the Wii MotionPlus accessory in a single controller
 * Comes in a variety of attractive colors, many of which match existing Wii console color schemes
 * Maintains the same compatibility and backwards compatibility as the original Wii Remote, meaning that you can use it to play these games even if the game contains no advanced motion-control features
 * The Wii Remote Plus controller is the same size as the Wii Remote, ensuring compatibility with all existing Wii Remote peripherals and skins

ADDITIONAL SCREENSHOTS
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories
